Sentence: They summon a spirit and ask it Margaret's questions about Henry's rule
She (Margaret) says she (Margaret) will try to have him (Henry) returned or will be banished, too
He (Henry) says he (Henry) can't live without her (Margaret) and wants to stay
Henry enters, followed by Margaret and Somerset
York's army is winning, so Margaret urges Henry to flee back to London, where he (Henry) has support
